moves.3... Nf6 4. Ng5 d5 5. exd5 b5: This move is uncommon. It is a different approach then Na5.
moves.6. dxc6: Not the best move. The best was 6.Bf1, followed by black Bg4, 7.f3, Nxd5, 8.Nxf7, Kxf7, and so on.
moves.6... bxc4 7. O-O Bd6 8. d3: Not the best either. This move allows me to get rid of my weak, and horrible pawn over a useful pawn. Better was Qe2 or Nc3.
moves.8... cxd3 9. Qxd3 O-O: Castling to safety. Right now, I thought I had a good game going.
moves.10. Nc3 a5: Trying to maybe make a small attack, Ba6.
moves.11. Nd5: Well, here is a move that I did not think about much at all.
moves.11... Nxd5: Well,"sigh", I failed. I was on a great winning streak right now, and now this......this..move, made me lose it. Dang!!! I won 17 games in a row!! I'm sad.
moves.12. Qxh7#: Easily punished me, and I deserve it. Thanks for watching this short game.
